## Ingredients

* 1 whole wheat tortilla
* 1 tbsp hummus
* 2 leaves romaine lettuce
* 75 g deli turkey
* 75 g cucumber
* 3 cherry tomatoes
* 30 g bell pepper
* 1/4 avocado
